meanings.definition: A woman who has given birth to more than one child.
meanings.sent1: The hospital provided a special class for multiparas to share their experiences.
meanings.sent2: The clinic had a support group for multiparas to connect with each other.
meanings.sent3: The multiparas at the baby shower shared funny stories about their children.
meanings.sent4: In the park, the group of multiparas resembled a flock of nurturing birds.
meanings.sent5: The multiparas' bond over motherhood was as strong as steel.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a woman who has given birth to more than one child.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the benefits of the multiparas support group.
meanings.sent2: The hospital had a special ward for multiparas to recover after delivery.
meanings.sent3: The multiparas-themed baby shower decorations were a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her nurturing nature was as evident as that of a multiparas' love for her children.
meanings.sent5: The multiparas' strength and resilience were as inspiring as a beacon in the dark.
